name: WiTCh
author: pattyland

sections.description:
WordPress moTion Controlling enables your visitors to use motion gestures to interact with your page.

View a Demo here!

At the moment no options to configure.

Features

  • use right and left swipe to navigate between posts

Supported Controllers

  • Leap Motion 3D Controller
sections.installation:
1. Upload the witch folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
0.1.4

Updated for WordPress 3.9.1 Updated LeapJS to 0.5.0

0.1.3

Fixed an error with a lib

0.1.2

Code Cleanup

0.1.1

Removed CDN for LeapJS

0.1

First Release.
